content: @Richard Kavanagh Just seen the "ODS site code" in the GPConnect-Organization-1-0 profile - could you tell me what it is? I've never encountered an ODS site code, only an ODS code before.

I've been using it recently to populate a HAPI FHIR Server. (Git: https://github.com/KevinMayfield/AyeUp/tree/master/SDS-HAPI) It's not that fast at the mo but will be adding better queuing (async) to improve that. On a related note: I'm working on a adding an NHS ITK HL7v2 feed into HAPI JPA Server (in same git) using the older hl7v2 hapi (tomcat, camel + activemq)
Ah OK, thanks Kev. I guess I'd not heard about "site codes" as GPs don't have them.
Your ODS-FHIR server looks cool - i will have to check it out. I'm sure Endeavour will need one of these at some point :-)
You probably have but under one of the previous names. I think they we're printed on FP10's but could be confusing that with military versions.
